product_name: Backpacker's Pantry Organic Peanut and Raisin Oatmeal - Single Serving
long_description: Get your morning started right with a tasty bowl of Backpacker's Pantry Organic Peanut and Raisin oatmeal. Includes a packet of crushed peanuts to add nice crunchy texture to the oatmeal. Simply add the crushed peanuts to the other ingredients, add 1 cup of boiling water, stir well and then let sit 5 min. before serving. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Get your morning started right with a tasty bowl of Backpacker's Pantry Organic Peanut and Raisin oatmeal.
